lead_paragraph: Luís Figo and Michael van Praag have both withdrawn from the May 29 poll of the 209 FIFA member federations.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Two FIFA Candidates Drop Out
headline.main: 2 FIFA Candidates Drop Out of Presidential Race

snippet: Luís Figo and Michael van Praag have both withdrawn from the May 29 poll of the 209 FIFA member federations.
abstract: Luis Figo and Michael van Praag drop out of presidential race to head international soccer federation FIFA, leaving only Jordan's Prince Ali bin al-Hussein to oppose controversial incumbent Sepp Blatter; other soccer news noted.
